CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(tth_Vibe__c)),'', IMAGE('/resource/tth_trip_filter_icons/vibe/' + TEXT(tth_Vibe__c) + '.png', TEXT(tth_Vibe__c) , 50, 50)) &
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(tth_Vibe__c)),'',IMAGE('/resource/tth_trip_filter_icons/activities/' + TEXT(tth_Activities__c) + '.png', TEXT(tth_Activities__c) , 50, 50)) &
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(tth_Vibe__c)),'',IMAGE('/resource/tth_trip_filter_icons/geography/' + TEXT(tth_Geography__c) + '.png', TEXT(tth_Geography__c) , 50, 50)) &
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(tth_Vibe__c)),'',IMAGE('/resource/tth_trip_filter_icons/weather/' + TEXT(tth_Weather__c) + '.png', TEXT(tth_Weather__c) , 50, 50)) &
IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(tth_Vibe__c)),'',IMAGE('/resource/tth_trip_filter_icons/budget/' + TEXT(tth_Budget__c) + '.png', TEXT(tth_Budget__c) , 50, 50))
CustomField.label: Summary
